commandPickFromRightTabs.message: Pick Images from Current Tab + Right Tabs

extensionDescription.message: Chrome image downloader extension, bulk image downloader, enlarge and display images/videos on mouse-over for downloading.

optionBrowserActionLabel.message: Default action of the toolbar button

optionBrowserActionHelp.message: Right click on the toolbar button for other actions.

optionContextMenuLabel.message: Also add "Pick Images..." actions to contextmenu

optionCustomIconLabel.message: Customize the color of toolbar button

optionPreviewMaxHeightUpperBoundLabel.message: The maximum value of the thumbnail size slider

optionUseCacheLabel.message: Try to download images from browser cache

optionUseCacheHelp.message: The extension would try to get the image from cache before sending the image to download manager, which causes a noticeable delay before download manager starts if the image is not cached.

optionUseExpressionLabel.message: Use simple expression in the filename pattern

optionDisplayImageSizeUnderThumbnailLabe.message: Display image size under the thumbnail.

optionVariableMaxLengthLabel.message: Max length of each variable in the filename pattern

optionFilenameConflictActionHelp.message: Download may fail if there are multiple files downloaded with the same name at the same time. It is best to avoid filename conflict by using proper filename pattern, especially during batch download.

optionDownloadSingleImageHelp.message: These settings don't apply to batch download. Batch download settings are configured in batch download UI.

optionFilenamePatternLabel.message: Filename pattern, relative to default download folder in Firefox.

optionFilenamePatternHelpHTML.message: The pattern may include subfolder (separated with $SEPARATOR$).

optionFilenamePatternStandaloneEnabledLa.message: Use a different pattern for standalone images

optionIsolateTabsLabel.message: Isolate the tabs from each other when generating the filenames.

optionIsolateTabsHelpHTML.message: If this option is checked, the filename would be built according to the tab that the image is downloaded from, instead of the current tab. This affects page... variables and index.

optionSaveAsLabel.message: Ask me where to save the image instead of using default download folder.

optionSaveAsHelp.message: You should remove subfolder part in the filename pattern if this option is checked.

optionDownloadButtonLabel.message: Show a download button on hover

optionDownloadButtonMinWidth.message: Min width to trigger download button

optionDownloadButtonMinHeight.message: Min height to trigger download button

optionEscapeWithUnicodeLabel.message: Escape special characters into Unicode glyphs.

optionSrcAlternativeLabelHTML.message: Other HTML attributes containing image URL (Separated with $SEPARATOR$)

optionBlacklistLabel.message: Disable this extension in following domains. (One domain per line)

pickerMatchTypeLabel.message: Match type of the URL filter

gallery_select_all.message: Select All; To select a range, first unselect all then select the first item. Now select the last item with Shift + Click

gallery_copy.message: Copy URLs of the selected images to the clipboard

ui_total_title.message: Total number of parsed document (a document might be or might not be an image)

ui_saving_title.message: Total number of images that will be saved based on your filter settings

ui_deep_search_title.message:
0: do not extract linked images (fast)
1: Extract linked images (slow)
2: Extract linked images and parse destination HTML documents (images) (too slow)
 3: Extract linked images and parse destination HTML documents (images + links) (too slow; use with custom filters)

ui_no_extension.message: If no extension, save as JPG

ui_regexp_desc.message: Regular expression based on images URL (only matching images will be saved)

ui_blacklist_desc.message: Comma-separated list of keywords to exclude (matching images will NOT be saved)

ui_same_domain.message: Only save images from the same domain/server as the selected tab's URL

ui_accurate.message: Confirm mime-types and guess filenames from server

ui_calc.message: Find width and height of all images

ui_mask_desc.message: You can use this section to rename the image filenames to the desired format

ui_mask_keywords.message: You will need to put the desired keyword inside closed brackets like [name][extension]

ui_dialog.message: Show browser's save dialog to choose the destination directory

ui_delay.message: Number of seconds a request can take before automatically being terminated (a number between 5 to 120 seconds)

ui_too_many_errors.message: Too many errors occurred during the search. Toggling the "referer" option may fix the issue.

detection_delay.message: Number of seconds to pause after each server-side image detection (rate-limit)

download_delay.message: Number of seconds to pause after each server-side image download (rate-limit)

ui_relative.message: custom directory relative to the default download directory

ui_reset_title.message: Reset settings to the default values

ui_gallery_title.message: Open selected images in gallery mode

ui_copy_title.message: Copy selected images to the clipboard

ui_save_title.message: Download selected images to the default download directory

ui_save_dir_title.message: [Experimental Feature] Save selected images to a custom directory without first adding them to a ZIP archive. Only available on HTTPS pages if your browser supports the native file system

ui_prefs_zip_warning.message: Display a confirmation when "Download each image separately" is checked and the total number of images is more than

ui_networ_referer.message: Remove "referer" and "origin" headers while searching (restart required)

ui_networ_cors.message: Bypass network CORS while searching (restart required)

ui_doingdeepsearch.message: (Deep search is underway and may be slow.)

options_notify.message: Display desktop notification on image saving

options_head_delay.message: Delay in milliseconds after each image metadata read

options_head_timeout.message: Timeout in seconds to abort metadata request for an image

options_dig_delay.message: Delay in milliseconds after each HTML document parsing

options_dig_timeout.message: Timeout in seconds to wait for parsing of an HTML document

PVIpressESC.message: Hint: Press the "$ESC$" key to close

PVIpressD.message: Hint: Press the "$D$" key to download this image

show_reduce_size_btn_title.message: Compress the size of image files.

popupDisableBigImgPreview.message: Stop previewing large images in web pages.
